item.title: Array Padding - Only One Side
item.description: numpy.pad provides an easy way to pad a numpy array. For instance, if you want to add two 3’s and four -7’s to an array, you can do the following - import numpy as np a = np.array([1, 2, -1]) np.pad(a, (2, 4), "constant", constant_values=(3, -7)) # array([ 3, 3, 1, 2, -1, -7, -7, -7, -7]) But, what if you only want to pad the right side or left side?
